scripts.build: npm run install:deps && npm run build:app
scripts.install:deps: if [ "$SERVICE_TYPE" = "frontend" ]; then cd frontend && npm ci; else cd backend && npm ci; fi
scripts.build:app: if [ "$SERVICE_TYPE" = "frontend" ]; then cd frontend && npm run build; else cd backend && npm run build; fi
scripts.start: if [ "$SERVICE_TYPE" = "frontend" ]; then npm run start:frontend; else npm run start:backend; fi
scripts.dev: if [ "$SERVICE_TYPE" = "frontend" ]; then cd frontend && npm run dev; else cd backend && npm run start:dev; fi
